changeLog: changed village gen boolean to integer value to better control probability of shop or bank generating
added foundations to shop and bank. no more floating buildings
added looting modifier to mob drops. looting I = 2x drops, looting II = 3x drops, and looting III = 4x drops
added tab completion to givecoins, send, and uc commands
reduced minshaft and dungeon loot (changed from large coin bags to small coin bags)
